    <facet>

    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_97370</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_97370</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Chemical reaction between carbon and lead oxide</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Chemische Reaktion zwischen Carbon und Leitung 
Oxid</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Réaction chimique entre le carbone et l'oxyde de
plomb</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Reação química entre o carbono e o óxido da 
ligação</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Reazione chimica fra carbonio e l'ossido del 
piombo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Χημική αντίδραση μεταξύ του άνθρακα και του οξειδίου 
μολύβδου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Reacción química entre el carbón y el óxido 
del terminal de componente</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Second of two illustrations that show carbon reacting with lead oxide. This illustration shows the word equation for the reaction. The other illustration shows the experimental set-up.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Carbon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Carbon dioxide</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">chemical reaction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">heat</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">lead</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">lead oxide</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">An zweiter Stelle von zwei Abbildungen, die den 
Carbon zeigen, der mit Leitung Oxid reagiert. Diese Abbildung 
zeigt die Wortgleichung für die Reaktion. Die andere Abbildung 
zeigt die experimentelle Installation.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">En second lieu de deux illustrations qui montrent
le carbone réagissant avec de l'oxyde de plomb. Cette 
illustration montre l'équation de mot pour la réaction. 
L'autre illustration montre l'installation expérimentale.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Em segundo de duas ilustrações que mostram o 
carbono que reage com o óxido da ligação. Esta ilustração 
mostra a equação da palavra para a reação. A outra 
ilustração mostra a instalação experimental.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In secondo luogo di due illustrazioni che mostrano
il carbonio che reagisce con l'ossido del piombo. Questa 
illustrazione mostra l'equazione di parola per la reazione. 
L'altra illustrazione mostra la messa a punto sperimentale.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δεύτερη δύο απεικονίσεων που εμφανίζουν άνθρακα που 
αντιδρά με το οξείδιο μολύβδου. Αυτή η απεικόνιση 
εμφανίζει εξίσωση λέξης για την αντίδραση. Η άλλη 
απεικόνιση εμφανίζει πειραματική οργάνωση.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">En segundo lugar de dos ilustraciones que 
muestran el carbón que reacciona con el óxido del terminal de 
componente. Esta ilustración muestra la ecuación de la palabra
para la reacción. La otra ilustración muestra la disposición 
experimental.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Carbon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kohlendioxyd</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">chemische Reaktion</string>
          </keyword>
